info.title: Z2O API
info.description: Z2O API to be used by Banks for integration.

post.summary: Get API Key for your bank

get.summary: Get list of companies connected to bank

put.summary: Update info of a particular company

delete.summary: Delete a particular company, this is not reversible

get.summary: Get info of a particular company
Get the settings for a particular company

put.summary: Update settings for a particular company

get.summary: Get connection details for a particular company
Get all the reports provided by a particular company
Get latest annotated data for a particular report provided by a particular company

post.summary: Get API Key for your company
Add a new ERP connection for the company

get.summary: Get list of all reports a company can provide for its ERP connection
Get list of reports company is providing

post.summary: Add a new report to provide

get.summary: Get latest data of a particular report that will be pushed

post.summary: Annotate the data of a particular report and then push it to bank
